content.description:
Flos breviter duransduro, -are: to endure iuvenilisiuvenilis, -e, adj.: youthful dicitur etasetas = aetas,
queque = quae citocito, adv.: quickly discedens ut levis umbra fugit.
content.question: In the sentence, ut is translated

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
